ace-playbook-documentation.description: ACE system playbook and technical plan documentation structure using markdown with YAML frontmatter

markdown-frontmatter.description: YAML frontmatter in markdown files for metadata (pattern_id, type, updated timestamp)

documentation-structure.description: Standardized documentation structure with sections: Summary, Technical Context, Implementation Approach, Success Criteria, Examples

pattern-lifecycle-management.description: Systematic approach to pattern application: identify, apply, verify, monitor

metadata-driven-documentation.description: Use structured metadata (YAML frontmatter) to categorize and version documentation

structured-knowledge-capture.description: Organize knowledge systematically with clear sections and consistent structure for reproducibility

verifiable-pattern-application.description: Include verification steps (tests, linting) and success criteria when documenting patterns

auto-generated-documentation.description: Use automated systems to generate and maintain documentation consistency (indicated by 'Auto-generated by ACE' footer)

cross-reference-examples.description: Reference related documentation files (insights.md) for real-world examples rather than duplicating content

metadata.discovery_method: bottom-up from file structure and content analysis
metadata.analysis_notes: This is a meta-document (a template/plan for documenting patterns) rather than code containing implementation patterns. The patterns discovered relate to documentation structure, metadata management, and knowledge organization within the ACE system.
